handball.text: The intense match saw Sweden barely losing 25-26 to Denmark in the European Championship.
Germanyâ€™s goalkeeper was the star of the game, making crucial saves in their 30-29 handball victory over Spain.
The match between Hungary and France ended with a draw, a rare outcome in international handball.
Denmark secured a convincing 32-28 win over Croatia, advancing to the semifinals of the handball World Cup.
Poland and Sweden battled to a 28-28 draw, with neither team giving an inch in the European Championship.
A thrilling handball match saw Egypt triumph 27-25 over Brazil in the Olympic qualifiers.
Hungary's handball team won 33-31 in overtime against Denmark, in a game full of unexpected twists.
France narrowly beat Norway 29-28 in a hard-fought handball battle during the World Cup quarterfinals.
Spain clinched a 30-29 handball win against Sweden, advancing to the finals of the Nations League.

football.text: In a dramatic final, Paris Saint-Germain won the Champions League, defeating Juventus 3-2.
The national teams of Spain and Germany faced off in a tense 1-1 draw, leaving the Euro 2024 qualifiers undecided.
Liverpool narrowly escaped defeat with a last-minute goal to draw 2-2 against AC Milan.
Real Madrid defeated Manchester City 4-3 in an intense match full of thrilling moments in the Champions League semifinals.
Bayern Munich won the Bundesliga after a 3-0 win over Borussia Dortmund, with Lewandowski scoring twice.
Arsenal suffered a 1-0 defeat against Chelsea in a game marked by several missed opportunities.
Brazil triumphed over Argentina 3-2 in a thrilling World Cup qualifier, featuring two red cards.
Monaco drew 1-1 against Marseille in a game full of tight defenses and missed chances.
Barcelona came back from two goals down to beat Atletico Madrid 3-2, with Messi scoring the winning goal.

basketball.text: The Golden State Warriors overcame the Chicago Bulls 115-112, with Curry scoring a crucial buzzer-beater.
Los Angeles Lakers faced a tough challenge against the Boston Celtics, eventually drawing 105-105 in a friendly match.
Giannis Antetokounmpo dominated the court, but the Bucks lost 95-98 to the Miami Heat in a close NBA matchup.
A record-breaking performance from Jayson Tatum helped the Boston Celtics secure a 123-120 win over the New York Knicks.
The Denver Nuggets came from behind to defeat the Dallas Mavericks, 108-107, in an overtime thriller.
WNBA saw the Seattle Storm edge out the Washington Mystics 86-84, with Bird delivering a spectacular assist.
Toronto Raptors beat the Brooklyn Nets 115-114 after a buzzer-beater by Pascal Siakam.
Phoenix Suns defeated Milwaukee Bucks 111-110, with Devin Booker scoring 38 points.
The LA Clippers outscored the Portland Trail Blazers 120-119 in a thrilling double-overtime game.

tennis.text: Rafael Nadal fought hard but ultimately lost to Daniil Medvedev in a 5-set match at the Australian Open.
The Wimbledon semifinal saw Novak Djokovic narrowly defeat Stefanos Tsitsipas 6-7, 7-6, 6-4, 7-6.
Coco Gauff won her semifinal match at the US Open but struggled in the final against Emma Raducanu.
Naomi Osaka withdrew from the French Open, citing injury concerns before her match against Simona Halep.
In an unexpected turn of events, Zverev defeated Alcaraz in a thrilling five-setter in the US Open quarterfinals.
Serena Williams faced a tough challenge against Victoria Azarenka, ultimately losing in straight sets.
Sinner upset Tsitsipas at the Miami Open, winning 6-4, 3-6, 7-5 in a high-energy match.
Federer and Nadal played an exhibition match to raise funds for charity, thrilling tennis fans.
Djokovic battled his way to a four-set victory over Casper Ruud in the French Open.
